docs.lead_paragraph: The Governor's Fair Price Milk Committee, of which Dr. Royal S. Copeland, City Health Commissioner, is Chairman, made public yesterday a report to Governor Smith, in which it recommends that the Legislature declare the milk business a public utility, and that a...

headline.main: URGE MILK CONTROL BY STATE BOARD; Governor's Investigators Propose That Dairy Business Be Managed as a Public Utility.POWER TO FIX FAIR PRICESRecommend That City Engage in Trade to Insure ConstantSupply for Babies. Milk Should Be Cheapest Here. URGE MILK CONTROL BY STATE BOARD Would Keep Control of Trade. Distribution by Zones. In Province of Public Health. Advantages of Collective Trading. Greatest Waste in Delivery. How to Save Loss in Bottles. Intimates Illegal Price Fixing.
